intro: Stellaria reticulivena, commonly known as the net-veined starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the Caryophyllaceae family. It is characterized by its small, star-shaped flowers that typically bloom in shades of white or pink. The plant has a delicate, sprawling growth habit with hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves. Its leaves are notable for their intricate, net-like venation patterns, which give it its scientific name. Stellaria reticulivena is often found in moist, grassy areas and is relatively uncommon in the wild.
